class.name: MediaPipeCategory
class.description: A MediaPipe task data container that defines a single classification result.

method.name: has_category_name
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the category has [member category_name].

method.name: has_display_name
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the category has [member display_name].

method.name: make_vector_proto_packet
method.description: Creates a [MediaPipePacket] that contains a vector of [code]mediapipe::Classification[/code]s.

members.member: The optional ID for the category.
The optional human-readable name for the category.
The index of the category in the classification model output.
The score for this category, should be in the range between [0, 1].
